item.description:
Hola Amigos!!!


Es apto que nos reunimos el 5 de mayo por la fiesta (Cinco de Mayo). We will meet at the usual time and place at 7:00 on Tuesday. At that time we should decide if we want to head over to El Sarape Mexican Restaurant. Will it be too crowded because of the holiday? Also we can carpool because we don't all know exactly how to get there.

Gracias y por favor - respuestame!


Echo de menos a todos!!!!!!

Hasta pronto-Barbara, organizadora

group.name: South Shore Spanish Language Meetup Group

item.name: Next South Shore Spanish Meetup
